===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=かどまつ|門|tr1=kado|t1=gate|松|tr2=matsu|t2=pine}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

Although the term literally means just ''gate pine'', bamboo became part of the traditional design starting from roughly the [[w:Kamakura period|Kamakura]] or [[w:Muromachi period|Muromachi period]]s. Compare the [[symbolism]] of the [[evergreen]] pine [[Christmas tree]] as a representation of life in the midst of winter.
